Class ListView<T>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views.BaseView
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views.ListView<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the list items
public class ListView<T> extends BaseView
Generic list view for the CLI.

  • Constructor Details

    • ListView

      public ListView(List<T> listItems, Function<T,org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi> customRenderer, String title, String prompt, String listEmpty, boolean centered, int rowsPerItem)
      Create a ListView with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      listItems - the items of the list
      customRenderer - a function that returns the formatted string (ansi) to be displayed for a given item
      title - the title of the list
      prompt - the message displayed to the user when asking for input
      listEmpty - the message displayed to the user when the list is empty
      centered - whether the list items are displayed centered in the screen or not
      rowsPerItem - number of rows allocated for every list item
